summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eastlake Avenue, from Almy Street to Fillmore Street; East Galer Street, from Eastlake Avenue to Franklin Avenue; Franklin Avenue, from East Galer Street to East Newton Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 656 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
